akas: Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card Arc World-wide (English title)
akas from release info: Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card Arc World-wide (English title)

1.title: Sakura and the Clear Cards

episode of.title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card Arc (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: It's April, the cherry trees are in full bloom, and Sakura has entered Tomoeda Middle School. She's reunited with Syaoran, who has returned from Hong Kong, and her new student life has begun.

2.title: Sakura and the Room with No Exit

episode of.title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card Arc (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: It's the new term, and the hot topic at school is clubs! Sakura and Tomoyo decide to join the same clubs they did in elementary school: cheerleading and chorus.

3.title: Sakura's Heavy Rain Alert

episode of.title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card Arc (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: It's been raining buckets all day. Sakura and Tomoyo take shelter in a park on the way home from school, and suddenly the Key of Dreams at Sakura's chest begins to shine... Is it the work of a card?

4.title: Sakura and the Lovely Transfer Student

episode of.title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card Arc (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: A new transfer student named Akiho Shinomoto joins Sakura's class. She's just arrived in Japan after living overseas, so her Japanese is still very stiff and formal. Sakura invites her to eat lunch with her group, excited to make a new friend.

5.title: Sakura Feels a Pull at the Flower Viewing

episode of.title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card Arc (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Sakura is having a flower-viewing party with her friends Tomoyo, Syaoran, Chiharu, Naoko, and Yamazaki, as well as the new transfer student Akiho.

6.title: Sakura, the Rabbit and the Song of the Moon

episode of.title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card Arc (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: Sakura continues to face the hooded figure in her dreams. At school, everyone says they want to hear Akiho sing again after being charmed by her voice at their flower-viewing party, so they meet in the music room after classes are over.

7.title: Sakura and a Game of Tag in the Garden

episode of.title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card Arc (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: Sakura and Kero-chan visit Tomoyo's house to test the abilities of the Record card. Tomoyo's mother appears and gives Sakura an enthusiastic welcome, then the girls head outside to test the card.

8.title: Sakura, the Clock, and a Hide-and-Seek Game

episode of.title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card Arc (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: Sakura finds out that Akiho has moved into the mansion formerly inhabited by Clow Reed's reincarnation, Eriol. She pays a visit with Tomoyo and meets Kaito, the butler who's been taking care of Akiho since her childhood.

9.title: Sakura's Thrilling Aquarium Visit

episode of.title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card Arc (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: Sakura invites Syaoran out for the day with tickets given to her by her father. She's worked hard on the rolled omelets for their lunch, and now they make their way to the aquarium Sakura visited when she captured the Clow Card, Watery.

10.title: Sakura and the Sleep Labyrinth

episode of.title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card Arc (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: Akiho pays a visit to Sakura's house one evening while her father and brother are both away. They look at Sakura's elementary school pictures and have dinner together, but then Akiho suddenly falls asleep.

11.title: Sakura and the Upside-Down Penguin

episode of.title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card Arc (TV Series 2017– )

11.plot: Syaoran meets Kaito through a chance encounter on the way home from school. He informs Eriol, whom he's beem secretly keeping in touch with, and they both begin to suspect Kaito is a very powerful magician.

12.title: Sakura and the Ice Ball Game Tournament

episode of.title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card Arc (TV Series 2017– )

12.plot: Sakura and her friends participate in an after-school sports tournament. However, a sudden snowstorm rages that is the work of the "Hail" card.

13.title: Sakura and Welcome Back, Meiling

episode of.title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card Arc (TV Series 2017– )

13.plot: Sakura is overjoyed to see Syaoran's cousin, Meiling, make an unannounced visit from Hong Kong. Meiling asks to stay at Sakura's house, so they head straight there. Meanwhile, the power Toya lost by giving it to Yukito is gradually starting to return.

14.title: Sakura, the Shrine and the Zoo?

episode of.title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card Arc (TV Series 2017– )

14.plot: Sakura is visiting the Tsukimine Shrine market with Meiling, Akiho, and the rest of their friends. She enjoys a day of browsing the many shops and stalls on the grounds along with Akiho, who's never seen a Japanese shrine before.

15.title: Sakura's Nostalgic Viewing Party

episode of.title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card Arc (TV Series 2017– )

15.plot: Meiling, Sakura, and Syaoran meet up at Sakura's house where they encourage Syaoran to get more rest. Later, at Tomoyo's house, the group watches some home movies when the earth starts shaking.

16.title: Sakura and Meiling's Friend

episode of.title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card Arc (TV Series 2017– )

16.plot: Sakura manages to capture the card that showed up at Tomoyo's house, but her relief is short-lived. As they're returning home, Sakura and Meiling are suddenly attacked by a mysterious girl in the road!

17.title: Sakura and the Crazy Sweets

episode of.title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card Arc (TV Series 2017– )

17.plot: Today is the cooking lesson in home ec class that everyone's been looking forward to. Sakura's morning is thrown into a panic when she forgets her apron, but she and her friends are excited to make roll cakes in class.

18.title: Sakura and the Fire and Water Birds

episode of.title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card Arc (TV Series 2017– )

18.plot: When Sakura senses a card late at night, she heads to Tsukimine Shrine with Kero-chan, Tomoyo, and Syaoran.

19.title: Sakura and Akiho's Lullaby

episode of.title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card Arc (TV Series 2017– )

19.plot: Sakura and Akiho perform a reading of a children's story. Sakura had used the power of a card to record the event, but she notices something odd when she replays the footage.

20.title: Sakura, Rainbows, and Grandpa

episode of.title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card Arc (TV Series 2017– )

20.plot: Sakura is spending her Sunday morning making rolled omelets for the homemade lunches she's taking for her outing with Syaoran.

21.title: Sakura, the Mirror and the Key of Memories

episode of.title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card Arc (TV Series 2017– )

21.plot: Cerberus and Yue meet with Eriol via magic to discuss Sakura's new cards. Eriol has found out that Kaito took something from the magic association he once belonged to, but at that moment, Kaito's magic severs the trio's communication link.

22.title: Sakura's Clear Cards

episode of.title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card Arc (TV Series 2017– )

22.plot: Eriol orders Yue and Kero to keep a secret about Akiho and Kaito from Sakura. Despite their reservations, they do so as the cloaked figure appears before Sakura once again.

-1.title: OVA: Sakura and the Two Bears

episode of.title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card Arc (TV Series 2017– )

-1.plot: A prologue to the first episode, Sakura finished transforming all the cards, and now she needs to say goodbye to her friend Shaoran who is returning to China.

imdb.plot outline: Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card starts at the point where Cardcaptor Sakura ends, when Sakura Kinomoto starts junior high school alongside her friends, including her new boyfriend Syaoran, who had just returned to Tomoeda. After having a prophetic dream about a mysterious cloaked figure, all of the Sakura Cards turn blank and are rendered completely powerless, thus starting her quest to find out what is wrong. In doing so, Sakura and her friends, along with her guardians and protectors kerobearos and Yue, discover and capture the transparent cards using a new and much stronger mystical key and incantation.
imdb.title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card Arc
plot: Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card starts at the point where Cardcaptor Sakura ends, when Sakura Kinomoto starts junior high school alongside her friends, including her new boyfriend Syaoran, who had just returned to Tomoeda. After having a prophetic dream about a mysterious cloaked figure, all of the Sakura Cards turn blank and are rendered completely powerless, thus starting her quest to find out what is wrong. In doing so, Sakura and her friends, along with her guardians and protectors kerobearos and Yue, discover and capture the transparent cards using a new and much stronger mystical key and incantation.::Kiddomay Trinityforce
